name: Tuk Tuk Taxi (itch)
description:
You are a Tuk Tuk Taxi driver with one goal, and only one. You need to get DOWN the road as far as possible. Don't go OUT of the road though, your tires might pop! The roads in this place are pretty messy though, you're going to have to avoid the obstacles or risk wrecking your Tuk Tuk.

Programming & Design: Storm Muller & MG Potgieter

Sound & Other Assets: From various free license asset sources, see in-game credits

NOTE: Plays best at 1280x720, but higher than that works too.
